I thought that you guys set pre uninstall as it is. 5) After try to install and restart application 2-3 times but it still shows like below pictures. Also, i didn't see any new entity at setting table for nivo slider . ![nivo](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/41533502/56915426-1afe5f80-6ad4-11e9-949e-99efaeae66a2.PNG)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: #3719 Allow to change plugin display order at runtime

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #3733 Nivo slider plugin installation now uses Path.Join to create a file path rather than string concatenation. This will prevent an exception due to a missing trailing slash on the sample images file path.

#3733 Refactored NivoSliderPlugin Install() and Uninstall() methods. Refactorings include separating larger code sections into smaller methods, separating the large InsertPicture line into multiple lines for simplicity, removal of redundant source code for banner picture 3, removal of redundant comments for //pictures and //settings and calling of _webHelper.GetStoreLocation(false) only once rather than for each picture.

#3733 Nivo slider plugin installation now uses NopFileProvider.Combine((params string[]) to create a file path rather than string concatenation. This will prevent an exception due to a missing trailing slash on the sample images file path.
